member.name: Windows.CreateAsyncBindCtx
member.summary: Creates an asynchronous bind context for use with asynchronous monikers.
member.param: This parameter is reserved and must be 0.
A pointer to the IBindStatusCallback interface used for receiving data availability and progress notification.

A pointer to the interface that can be used to enumerate formats for format negotiation during binding. This parameter can be NULL, in which case the caller is not interested in format negotiation during binding, and the default format of the object will be bound to.
Address of an * pointer variable that receives the interface pointer to the new bind context.

returns.para: This function can return the following values.

listheader.description: The method ran out of memory and did not complete.
One or more parameters are invalid.

member.name: Windows.CreateFormatEnumerator
member.summary: Creates an object that implements over a static array of structures.
member.param: Number of structures in the static array specified by the rgfmtetc parameter. The cfmtetc parameter cannot be zero.
Pointer to a static array of structures.
Address of pointer variable that receives the interface pointer to the enumerator object.

returns.para: This function returns S_OK on success. Other possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.
